topPRs.title: Add plugin-fluxpoint-kg to registry
topPRs.author: RolandOne
topPRs.body:
This PR adds plugin-fluxpoint-kg to the registry.

- Package name: plugin-fluxpoint-kg
- GitHub repository: github:RolandOne/plugin-fluxpoint-kg
- Version: 0.1.0
- Description: Quick backend-only plugin template for ElizaOS

Submitted by: @RolandOne

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Added a new plugin entry for "plugin-fluxpoint-kg" to the plugin configuration.

topPRs.title: Add plugin-coinrailz
topPRs.author: tdnupe3
topPRs.body:
Add plugin-coinrailz - 41 crypto micropayment services for AI agents Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/plugin-coinrailz Provides x402 protocol integration for AI agents to access: - Trading intelligence (gas prices, whale alerts, MEV detection) - DEX analytics and arbitrage scanning - Prediction markets (Polymarket odds, events, search) - Real estate valuations - Stock/forex sentiment analysis - Compliance services (KYC, AML, OFAC screening)

Greptile Summary

- Adds `plugin-coinrailz` entry to the ElizaOS plugin registry for crypto micropayment services and AI agent integrations - Uses non-standard `npm:` prefix instead of `github:` format used by all other registry entries - Introduces JSON syntax errors with missing commas and improper alphabetical ordering in `index.json`

Important Files Changed

| Filename | Overview | |----------|----------| | `index.json` | Added plugin-coinrailz entry with incorrect npm: format, missing commas, and alphabetical ordering issues causing JSON syntax errors |

Confidence score: 1/5

- This PR has critical issues that will definitely break the registry and cannot be merged in its current state - Score reflects JSON syntax errors, format inconsistencies with npm: prefix instead of github:, missing commas, and improper alphabetical ordering that violates registry conventions - Pay close attention to `index.json` which needs complete reformatting to match registry standards and fix syntax errors

Sequence Diagram

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant User participant GitHub participant "GitHub Actions" participant "generate-registry.js" participant "GitHub API" participant npm participant "Registry Site" User->>GitHub: "Create PR to modify index.json" GitHub->>GitHub Actions: "Trigger PR validation workflow" GitHub Actions->>GitHub Actions: "Validate JSON format and structure" GitHub Actions->>GitHub: "Provide review feedback" User->>GitHub: "Merge approved PR" GitHub->>GitHub Actions: "Trigger registry generation workflow" GitHub Actions->>generate-registry.js: "Execute registry generation script" generate-registry.js->>GitHub API: "Query plugin repository metadata" GitHub API->>generate-registry.js: "Return repository details" generate-registry.js->>npm: "Query package metadata" npm->>generate-registry.js: "Return package details" generate-registry.js->>GitHub: "Update generated-registry.json" GitHub Actions->>Registry Site: "Deploy updated registry" ``` ## Summary by CodeRabbit * **New Features** * Plugin-coinrailz is now available in the registry, enabling access to additional functionality and integrations. ✏️ Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.
